<ce:section-title id="sect0040">Preparation of complexes 1 and 2.</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0040" view="all">
<ce:bold>[Co<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(bpm)(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>(L)]<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>n</ce:italic>
</ce:inf> (1)</ce:bold> A mixture of H<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>L (0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 40.6<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg), bpm (0.10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 17.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg), Co(ClO<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.20<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 73.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg), NaOH (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg) was placed in a Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel (25<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL), heated to 140<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 3 days, and then cooled to room temperature over 24<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h. Red prism crystals were obtained. Yield: 41.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 55% (based on H<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>L). Elemental analysis (%): calcd for (C<ce:inf loc="post">32</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">25</ce:inf>Co<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">11</ce:inf>): C, 51.56; H, 3.38; N, 5.64; Found: C, 51.46; H, 3.44; N, 5.57. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3442<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>w, 1602<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>s, 1523<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>s, 1418<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>s, 1394<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>s, 1215<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>m, 1024<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>m, 809<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>s, 754<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>s.</ce:para><ce:para id="p0045" view="all">
<ce:bold>{[Co(bpe)(H</ce:bold>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>
</ce:inf>
<ce:bold>O)(H</ce:bold>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>
</ce:inf>
<ce:bold>L)]·(bpe)</ce:bold>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:bold>0.5</ce:bold>
</ce:inf>
<ce:bold>·(H</ce:bold>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>
</ce:inf>
<ce:bold>O)}</ce:bold>
<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:italic>
<ce:bold>n</ce:bold>
</ce:italic>
</ce:inf>
<ce:bold>(2). 2</ce:bold> was synthesized in the similar way as that described for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>, except that bpm was replaced by bpe (0.20<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 36.4<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg). Purple block crystals were obtained. Yield: 40.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 52% (based on H<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>L). Elemental analysis (%): calcd for (C<ce:inf loc="post">40</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">31</ce:inf>CoN<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>): C, 62.18; H, 4.04; N, 5.44; Found: C, 62.09; H, 4.09; N, 5.50. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3510<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>w, 3430<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>w, 1676<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>m, 1602<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>s, 1535<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>s, 1406<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>m, 1264<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>m, 827<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>s, 766<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>s, 698<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>s.</ce:para>
clean_text:
Preparation of complexes 1 and 2.

 [Co2(bpm)(H2O)3(L)] n  (1) A mixture of H4L (0.1mmol, 40.6mg), bpm (0.10mmol, 17.1mg), Co(ClO4)2⋅6H2O (0.20mmol, 73.2mg), NaOH (0.2mmol, 8mg) was placed in a Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel (25mL), heated to 140°C for 3 days, and then cooled to room temperature over 24h. Red prism crystals were obtained. Yield: 41.0mg, 55% (based on H4L). Elemental analysis (%): calcd for (C32H25Co2N3O11): C, 51.56; H, 3.38; N, 5.64; Found: C, 51.46; H, 3.44; N, 5.57. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3442w, 1602s, 1523s, 1418s, 1394s, 1215m, 1024m, 809s, 754s.

 {[Co(bpe)(H  2  O)(H  2  L)]⋅(bpe)  0.5  ⋅(H  2  O)}   n   (2). 2 was synthesized in the similar way as that described for 1, except that bpm was replaced by bpe (0.20mmol, 36.4mg). Purple block crystals were obtained. Yield: 40.2mg, 52% (based on H4L). Elemental analysis (%): calcd for (C40H31CoN3O10): C, 62.18; H, 4.04; N, 5.44; Found: C, 62.09; H, 4.09; N, 5.50. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3510w, 3430w, 1676m, 1602s, 1535s, 1406m, 1264m, 827s, 766s, 698s.
